title: Gibbs sampler for the Bradley‚ÄìTerry Stochastic Block Model (BT‚ÄìSBM) ‚Äî gibbs_bt_sbm
text: w_ij Integer numeric square matrix \(n \times n\) directed wins (j). Must nonnegative zero diagonal. function builds \(n_{ij} = w_{ij} + w_{ji}\) internally. Positive shape parameter Gamma prior \(\lambda_k \sim \mathrm{Gamma}(,b)\). algorithm uses \(b = \exp(\psi())\) \(\mathbb{E}[\log \lambda_k] = 0\) priori. prior Character scalar, one "DP", "PY", "DM", "GN". alpha_PY, sigma_PY Hyperparameters Pitman‚ÄìYor / Dirichlet Process. prior="DP" use alpha_PY (sigma_PY ignored). prior="PY" use alpha_PY sigma_PY (0,1). beta_DM, K_DM Hyperparameters finite Dirichlet‚ÄìMultinomial prior. K_DM maximum number allowed clusters. gamma_GN Hyperparameter Gnedin prior. T_iter, T_burn Integers: total iterations burn-. Must satisfy T_burn < T_iter. init_x Optional integer vector length n initial labels (1-based). store_z Logical; TRUE, store latent Z draws (heavy). verbose Logical; TRUE, prints progress every 1000 iterations.

title: Variance of the number of clusters under the Gnedin prior ‚Äî gnedin_K_var
text: Using factorial‚Äìordinary moment relation \(\mathbb{E}[K_n^2]=\mathbb{E}[K_n(K_n-1)]+\mathbb{E}[K_n]\), variance $$   \mathrm{Var}(K_n) \;=\; \mathbb{E}[K_n(K_n-1)] + \mathbb{E}[K_n] - \{\mathbb{E}[K_n]\}^2, $$ $$   \mathbb{E}[K_n(K_n-1)]   \;=\; n(n-1)(1-\gamma)\,\frac{\Gamma(n)\,\Gamma(1+\gamma)}{\Gamma(n+\gamma)}. $$ implementation uses lgamma numerical stability vectorized n gamma (standard R recycling rules).

text: n_players Integer. Number players \(n\). K Integer. Number blocks. x Optional integer vector length n_players values 1:K. NULL, uses rep(seq_len(K), length.= n_players). mean_matches Positive numeric. Poisson mean match counts present edges. p_edge Numeric [0,1]. Probability unordered pair present topology. lambda Optional positive numeric vector length K. NULL, geometric sequence used: lambda_base * lambda_ratio^(0:(K-1)). lambda_base Positive numeric. Base geometric schedule lambda provided. Default 0.08 (snippet). lambda_ratio Positive numeric. Ratio geometric schedule lambda provided. Default 2.3 (snippet). reverse_lambda Logical. text: list components: N ‚Äî \(n \times n\) integer matrix symmetric match counts zero diagonal. W ‚Äî \(n \times n\) integer matrix directed win counts w[, j] + w[j, ] = N[, j]. x ‚Äî integer vector block labels 1:K. lambda ‚Äî numeric vector length K used build theta. theta ‚Äî \(K \times K\) matrix entries \(\theta_{ab} = \lambda_a / (\lambda_a + \lambda_b)\).

title: Sample a Bradley‚ÄìTerry Stochastic Block Model (BT-SBM) tournament ‚Äî sample_from_BTSBM
text: workflow : Sample symmetric match-count matrix \(N\) first drawing random subset unordered pairs probability p_edge, assigning selected pair Poisson\((mean\_matches)\) number matches. Compute block--block Bradley‚ÄìTerry matrix \(\theta = \lambda \mathbf{1}^\top / (\lambda \mathbf{1}^\top + \mathbf{1}\lambda^\top)\). unordered pair \(N_{ij}>0\), draw \(w_{ij} \sim \text{Binomial}(N_{ij}, \theta_{x_i, x_j})\) set \(w_{ji} = N_{ij} - w_{ij}\). default, block labels assigned deterministically rep(seq_len(K), length.= n_players) mirror example, can pass custom label vector via x.
